properties.name: ‚≠ê Gold
properties.description: Assigned to critical data assets within your organization.

properties.name: 📉 Least Queried
properties.description: Assigned to Tables that are among the least queried inside the data platform within the past 30 days.

properties.name: 📉 Least Changed
properties.description: Assigned to Tables that are among the least changed inside the data platform within the past 30 days.

properties.name: 📈 Most Queried
properties.description: Assigned to Tables that are among the highest queried inside the data platform within the past 30 days.

properties.name: 💲 Large Table
properties.description: Assigned to Tables that are among the largest in terms of storage size footprint inside the data platform within the past 30 days.

properties.name: 🚫 No Recent Queries
properties.description: Assigned to Tables that have not been queried within the past 30 days.

properties.name: 🚫 No Recent Changes
properties.description: Assigned to Tables that have not been changed within the past 30 days.
